Returns the authorization information that is used to get a valid MDE token.

Returns the authorization information that is used to get a valid MDE token including current token expiration state and current token roles. To clear, please use the Clear-MdeAuthorizationInfo function.
Returns all security baselines assessments for all devices, on a per-device basis.
Returns all security baselines assessments for all devices, on a per-device basis. It returns a table with a separate entry for every unique combination of DeviceId, ProfileId, ConfigurationId.

dev:type.maml:name: PSCustomObject. The Get-MdeBaselineComplianceAssessmentByMachine function returns a list of or a single PSCustomObject containing the parsed baseline compliance assessment objects.

maml:description.maml:para: Returns one or more links to all security baselines assessments for all devices, on a per-device basis.

Returns one or more links to all security baselines assessments for all devices, on a per-device basis. It returns a table with a separate entry for every unique combination of DeviceId, ProfileId, ConfigurationId.
Optional. The number of hours that the download URLs will be valid for (Maximum 24 hours).
Optional. The number of hours that the download URLs will be valid for (Maximum 24 hours).

dev:type.maml:name: PSCustomObject. The Get-MdeBaselineComplianceAssessmentExport function returns a list of or a single PSCustomObject containing the parsed baseline compliance assessment objects.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves a list of all the possible security baselines assessment configurations and settings for all the available benchmarks.
If no parameters are specified, returns all Defender for Endpoint baseline configurations.

Optional. Specifies the filter for baseline configurations. A filter is supported for "id", "name", "operatingSystem", "operatingSystemVersion", "status", "settingsNumber", "passedDevices" and "totalDevices".

Optional. Specifies the filter for baseline configurations. A filter is supported for "id", "name", "operatingSystem", "operatingSystemVersion", "status", "settingsNumber", "passedDevices" and "totalDevices".

dev:type.maml:name: PSCustomObject. The Get-MdeBaselineConfiguration function returns a list of or a single PSCustomObject containing the parsed baseline configuration objects.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves a list of all security baselines assessment profiles created by the organization.
If no parameters are specified, returns all Defender for Endpoint baseline profiles.

Optional. Specifies the filter for baseline profiles. A filter is supported for "id", "name", "operatingSystem", "operatingSystemVersion", "status", "settingsNumber", "passedDevices" and "totalDevices".

Optional. Specifies the filter for baseline profiles. A filter is supported for "id", "name", "operatingSystem", "operatingSystemVersion", "status", "settingsNumber", "passedDevices" and "totalDevices".

dev:type.maml:name: PSCustomObject. The Get-MdeBaselineProfile function returns a list of or a single PSCustomObject containing the parsed baseline profile objects.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves your Microsoft Secure Score for Devices.
Retrieves your Microsoft Secure Score for Devices. A higher Microsoft Secure Score for Devices means your endpoints are more resilient from cybersecurity threat attacks.

dev:type.maml:name: PSCustomObject. The Get-MdeConfigurationScore function returns a single PSCustomObject containing the parsed device secure score object.

dev:type.maml:name: PSCustomObject. The Get-MdeExposureScore function returns a single PSCustomObject containing the parsed organizational exposure score object.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves a collection of alerts related to a given user ID.

Creates a service principal (app registration) for Defender for Endpoint.
Creates a service principal (app registration) for Defender for Endpoint with a given set of permissions to interact with MDE.
Optional. Service principal name, defaults to 'PSMDE'.
Optional. Service principal permissions, defaults to 'read'. Possible values are 'read', 'readwrite'. Assigns either all 'Read' or all 'ReadWrite' permissions to the new service principal.
Optional. If defined, the service principal will be created with delegated, not with application permissions.
Optional. If defined, a secret will be generated and the service principal details will be handed over to Set-MdeAuthorizationInfo.
Optional. If defined, it will not open a browser after the service principal was created to grant permissions.
Optional. Service principal name, defaults to 'PSMDE'.
Optional. Service principal permissions, defaults to 'read'. Possible values are 'read', 'readwrite'. Assigns either all 'Read' or all 'ReadWrite' permissions to the new service principal.
Optional. If defined, the service principal will be created with delegated, not with application permissions.
Optional. If defined, a secret will be generated and the service principal details will be handed over to Set-MdeAuthorizationInfo.
Optional. If defined, it will not open a browser after the service principal was created to grant permissions.
